medical_history.chief_complaint: Left abdominal pain accompanied by diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one week prior to presentation on August 9, 2023. The patient experienced left abdominal pain and diarrhea without hematochezia. Abdominal pain alleviated after treatment but isolated splenic vein thrombosis (ISVT) persisted. The patient was treated with systemic thrombolysis and by August 22, 2023, the abdominal pain had disappeared.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No history of serious comorbidities or pancreatic diseases. The patient used oral contraceptives daily for the past three months.
